CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 2, 1961, pg. 14A, reads: "Story Hour - Mrs. Izetta Besley, seated in right foreground, has a captivating influence on this class of pre-school tots at the Wesley Center Day Nursery, as she relates the plight of 'Little Red Ridinghood' or 'The Three Bears.' Anxious listeners include (left to right) Levi Williams, Kevin Trower, Charlene Foggie, Richard Cobbs and Roderick Decree."
TitMainTitle: Izetta Woodson or Besley drawing Santa Claus on chalkboard in front of children, from left: Richard Cobbs, Kevin Trower, Charlene Foggie, Levi Williams, and Roderick Decree, in Wesley Center AME Zion Church
CatSubject_tab: Wesley Center African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Churches--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Children--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
